message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to inform you that the details of your job offer have been updated. Kindly take a moment to review the updated offer information provided below.

Updated Offer Details:

  • Applicant Email: {{ doc.applicant_email }}
  • Job Applicant ID: {{ doc.job_applicant }}

We encourage you to carefully review the updated offer and contact us if you have any queries or require further clarification. For additional information, please refer to your Candidate Portal.

We look forward to having you join our team and wish you every success in your future endeavors.

Best regards,
The HR Team
name: Resend Job Offer
subject: Find Your Updated Job Offer
